location.address: Ground Floor, B 32/112 P, Sushant Smriti, Behind Sankat Mochan Mandir, Near Ram Mishthan, Saket Nagar

faqs.question: Do you accept insurance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we accept most major dental insurance plans. Please contact our office to verify your specific coverage.

faqs.question: How often should I visit the dentist?
faqs.answer: We recommend a check-up and cleaning every six months for most patients. However, some patients may need more frequent visits based on their oral health needs.

faqs.question: What should I do in a dental emergency?
faqs.answer: Contact our office immediately. We reserve time in our schedule for emergency appointments and will provide guidance on how to manage your situation until you can be seen.

faqs.question: Do you offer payment plans?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer flexible payment options and financing plans to help make dental care affordable for all our patients.

featured.title: Preventive Care
featured.description: Regular check-ups, cleanings, and preventive treatments to maintain your oral health.

featured.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
featured.description: Enhance your smile with teeth whitening, veneers, and other cosmetic procedures.

featured.title: Restorative Dentistry
featured.description: Repair damaged teeth with fillings, crowns, bridges, and dental implants.

all.title: Digital X-rays
all.description: Get accurate and detailed images of your teeth and gums with our digital X-ray technology.

all.title: Orthodontic Treatment
all.description: Straighten your teeth with braces. We offer traditional metal braces, ceramic braces, and Invisalign.

all.title: Endodontics
all.description: Treat root canals and other dental issues with our endodontic services.

all.title: Oral Surgery
all.description: Perform extractions, wisdom teeth removal and gum surgeries.

all.title: Pediatric Dentistry
all.description: Treat children with special needs and provide comprehensive dental care.

all.title: Implants
all.description: Replace missing teeth with dental implants.

team.name: Dr. Neha
team.description: Dr. Neha has over 7 years of experience in general and cosmetic dentistry. She is passionate about helping patients achieve their dream smiles.

footer.description: Providing quality dental care with a gentle touch. Your smile is our priority.
